scripts.build: pnpm install && pnpm build:common && pnpm build:cli && pnpm build:plugins
scripts.build:common: cd common && pnpm build && cd .. && pnpm export:schemas
scripts.pack:all: pnpm run pack:cli && pnpm run pack:common && pnpm run pack:plugins
scripts.pack:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist && cd ../..; done
